message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you.  Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,300,000 for your product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,300,000 is still a bit lower than what I'm hoping to get.  I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000.  This would be a great deal for both of us,  Let me know if you're interested.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand your position and am willing to consider an offer closer to your last proposal. I would like to counter with a price of $1,325,000 for your product. I hope this proposal is within your acceptable range.
